articles.description: As Christmas approaches, supermarket shelves start to fill up with many people's favourite festive treat a mince pie, but with each supermarket offering countless variations, the Mirror taste tested some of the best
articles.content:
Time to feast your mince pies on these festive favourites as boxes of the tasty treats hit the supermarket shelves. 
There are all sorts of weird and wonderful flavour combinations this year but do … [+6095 chars]
